title: Russia-Ukraine war: 11 killed and 11 wounded in Russian missile attacks; Wagner group classified as criminal organisation by US – live
description: Top general says 47 of 55 Russian missiles were shot down; US move allows for wider sanctions against mercenary groupRussia-Ukraine war at a glanceThe Ukrainian defence force has just posted this warning to Telegram: “Rockets in the direction of Vinnytsia and Kyiv region. Can change the trajectory. Stay in shelters. We believe in air defense.”  Continue reading...

title: 'Explosions and calls in the night': Zelenskyy recalls first moments of invasion and how close Russian forces got to him
description: The Ukrainian president has told Sky News he is not interested in meeting Vladimir Putin for peace talks, describing him as a nobody who lives in an information bubble and does not really know what's happening on the battlefield.

title: Tyre Nichols – live: Memphis police chief urges calm ahead of bodycam release of ‘heinous, inhumane’ beating
description: Nichols, 29, died on 10 January, three days after traffic stop turned into confrontation with officers

title: Memphis Braces for Tyre Nichols Traffic Stop Video Release
description: After Tyre Nichols’s death, footage of what the police have called a “confrontation” could clarify what happened, as the city braces for anguish and outrage.

title: Officials urge citizens to be nonviolent as anticipation builds around soon-to-be-released footage of an arrest that led to the death of Black motorist Tyre Nichols
description: Memphis police officers' conduct in the confrontation that preceded this month's death of Black motorist Tyre Nichols is a failing of basic humanity, the Tennessee city's police chief said as officials prepare to release video of the incident.

title: A timeline of the investigations into Tyre Nichols' death after a traffic stop and arrest by Memphis police
description: Nearly three weeks after a traffic stop in Memphis resulted in a violent arrest and subsequent death of a driver, police are expected to release police body camera footage of the incident to the public.

title: Tyre Nichols' family attorney says video shows police beating Nichols like a 'human pinata'
description: Attorneys for the family of Tyre Nichols, a Black man who died after a traffic stop in Memphis, Tennessee, said video footage shows he suffered a nonstop beating at the hands of police.

title: Nichols' family speaks out after seeing police footage
description: After a traffic stop in Memphis resulted in a violent arrest and subsequent death of 29-year-old Tyre Nichols, police are expected to release police body camera footage of the incident to the public. The family of Nichols and attorneys have viewed the traffic stop's video recordings, which have been described as a vicious, prolonged beating that lasted for minutes after officers chased down a fleeing Nichols. CNN's Sara Sidner reports.

title: Democrat Adam Schiff announces bid for Feinstein's US Senate seat in California
description: Democratic Rep. Adam Schiff announced a 2024 Senate bid on Thursday, launching a campaign for Sen. Dianne Feinstein's seat in what is shaping up to be a competitive Democratic primary.

title: Adam Schiff Announces Senate Run in California
description: Mr. Schiff, who led the first impeachment trial of President Donald J. Trump and later served on the House panel investigating the Capitol riot, will seek the seat held by Senator Dianne Feinstein.

title: Adam Schiff running for Senate in California, joining crowded 2024 primary
description: WASHINGTON — Rep. Adam Schiff, D-Calif., announced Thursday he's running for Senate in 2024, joining what's expected to be a crowded Democratic primary race for the seat held by Sen.

title: California Democratic Rep. Adam Schiff to run for US Senate seat held by Feinstein
description: California Rep. Adam Schiff on Thursday announced his candidacy for U.S. Senate, setting up a possible challenge to incumbent Sen. Dianne Feinstein.

title: Schiff announces he's running for Senate in California in 2024
description: The California Democrat is entering the primary to replace Sen. Dianne Feinstein, who has not yet said whether she will run for reelection.

title: Donald Trump’s Truth Social posts bode ill for his return to Facebook
description: As Trump was reinstated, Meta’s Nick Clegg stressed ‘guardrails’ were in place. He could soon find them testedIf Donald Trump’s activity on his Truth Social account is a reliable indicator of what his return to Facebook and Instagram will unleash, then Nick Clegg is going to be busy.The former US president has used his rightwing social media platform to push baseless claims of election fraud and amplified content related to the QAnon conspiracy multiverse. title: Donald Trump to be allowed back on to Facebook and Instagram
description: The social media firm Meta said the former US president's suspension will end in the coming weeks.

title: Meta to allow Donald Trump back on Facebook, Instagram
description: Meta Platforms Inc META.O said on Wednesday it will restore former US President Donald Trump's Facebook and Instagram accounts in the coming weeks, following a two-year suspension after the deadly Capitol Hill riot on January 6, 2021.

title: Meta announces it will reinstate Trump's Facebook and Instagram accounts
description: Social media giant Meta says it will reinstate former President Donald Trump's Facebook and Instagram accounts. And Florida Republican Senator Rick Scott  announces that he will seek reelection, forgoing a 2024 presidential bid. CBS News political director Fin Gomez joins Anne-Marie Green and Vlad Duthiers to discuss.

title: Trump's Facebook, Instagram accounts reinstated after two-year ban
description: Former President Trump's Facebook and Instagram accounts were reinstated after a two-year suspension for violating the platforms' rules.
